title: Sales volume of USB flash drives in Germany 2004 to 2018
summary: Overall Sales volume in millions has increased over the Year.
Sales volume in millions is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Sales volume in millions, of value 15.94 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Sales volume in millions about 13.5 was reached at Year 2013
